about_the_game:
ABOUT THIS CONTENT

Warhammer 40,000: SPACE MARINE - Original Soundtrack

Renowned composer duo Cris Velasco and Sascha Dikiciyan have crafted an expansive impassioned score inspired by Space Marine's stunning cinematic visuals and intuitive gameplay. Channeling the epic scale of this sci-fi fantasy, the score features orchestral compositions and modern filmic music production.

23 tracks, 57 mn. Includes MP3 and FLAC files.
(p)&(c) 2021 Games Workshop Limited.

Artist: Cris Velasco & Sascha Dikiciyan
Composer: Cris Velasco & Sascha Dikiciyan
Label: Laced Records

1 Prologue 02:26
2 Titus 02:59
3 Prelude To War 02:08
4 Against All Odds 02:39
5 Valkyrie Run 03:36
6 Battlements 03:16
7 Whispers Of The Dead 01:30
8 The Blood Ravens 02:15
9 Reunion With Mira 01:00
10 The Weirdboy 01:58
11 No Man 03:02
12 The Inquisitor 02:38
13 The Meat Grinder 03:05
14 Heart of Darkness 02:08
15 Fight For Honor 02:44
16 Titan 02:05
17 Legions Of Chaos 01:52
18 Heresy 03:52
19 A Hero 05:00
20 Chaos Emerges (Bonus Track) 01:53
21 Dropship Battle (Bonus Track) 01:33
22 We Shall Overcome (Bonus Track) 01:33
23 The Morgue (Bonus Track) 01:11

Channeling the epic scale of this sci-fi fantasy, the score features orchestral compositions and modern filmic music production.
